name: Remember Again
description:
Remember Again is a first person game, in which you look for the guilty of the destruction of your city and your family, while you immerse deeper and deeper into your past.

Assets that i used:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/forest-scene-84690 
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/asset-packs/standard-assets-for... 
  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/unity-samples-ui-25468

Sounds that i used:

  • (Bullet Impact)https://freesound.org/people/u1769092/sounds/423301/
  • (Gun Shot)https://freesound.org/people/schots/sounds/382735/
  • (BackGround-Falling Rain By Myuu)https://www.youtube.com/audiolibrary/music?nv=1
  • (Alarm-Spaceship Alarm)https://www.youtube.com/audiolibrary/music?nv=1
  • (Rocket Shoot)https://freesound.org/people/cydon/sounds/126507/

Special thanks to Daniel Rodriguez.
